dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so I was just reading about this incredible place, Kotor. It sounds, um, absolutely enchanting. Like, all these old stone streets, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so I was just reading about this incredible place, Kotor. It sounds, um, absolutely enchanting. Like, all these old stone streets, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Kotor! Yeah, totally. And it's got these breathtaking views from, like, this huge limestone mountain right in front of it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Kotor! Yeah, totally. And it's got these breathtaking views from, like, this huge limestone mountain right in front of it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? What I found super interesting, though, is the castle walls. They're, uh, incomplete, and actually lead *away* from the castle ruins at the bottom. So weird.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? What I found super interesting, though, is the castle walls. They're, uh, incomplete, and actually lead away from the castle ruins at the bottom. So weird.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's quite unique. So, how did our writer get there? I think they mentioned a bus from Dubrovnik, but then also a plane?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's quite unique. So, how did our writer get there? I think they mentioned a bus from Dubrovnik, but then also a plane?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Bus *from* Dubrovnik, but he apparently arrived by plane. We'll, uh, get to that later, I guess. But the article says the *main* attraction is actually the newer part of the city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Bus from Dubrovnik, but he apparently arrived by plane. We'll, uh, get to that later, I guess. But the article says the main attraction is actually the newer part of the city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? Outside the walls? Is it, like, better?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Outside the walls? Is it, like, better?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's more elaborate than Dubrovnik, which is saying something, but then he also said it had, uh, a certain blandness. Which, you know, is a bit of a buzzkill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's more elaborate than Dubrovnik, which is saying something, but then he also said it had, uh, a certain blandness. Which, you know, is a bit of a buzzkill.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not as elaborate or extensive as Dubrovnik, it has its own charm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And speaking of buzzkills, he absolutely *would not* recommend Hostel Old Town Kotor. Said it was awful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And speaking of buzzkills, he absolutely would not recommend Hostel Old Town Kotor. Said it was awful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I stayed, and highly recommend, Hostel Old Town Kotor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no! What, uh, what happened there? Like, was it the rooms, or the people?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no! What, uh, what happened there? Like, was it the rooms, or the people?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Both! Rude staff, inedible nightly dinner, the rooms were just awful. And its location?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Both! Rude staff, inedible nightly dinner, the rooms were just awful. And its location?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The people who work there are lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, the rooms were incredible...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, remote, right? Outside the walled city. Super inconvenient, I imagine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, remote, right? Outside the walled city. Super inconvenient, I imagine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and its central location inside the walled city is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And, like, restaurants were scarce, which is unexpected, with a severe lack of cuisine variety.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And, like, restaurants were scarce, which is unexpected, with a severe lack of cuisine variety.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Restaurants abound, as youd expect, with a variety of cuisines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. But then, he was actually quite impressed with the food overall, wasn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. But then, he was actually quite impressed with the food overall, wasn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, way more than Mostar, apparently. So, a bit of a mixed bag, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, way more than Mostar, apparently. So, a bit of a mixed bag, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like it! Enchanting, but, um, maybe pack your own dinner.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like it! Enchanting, but, um, maybe pack your own dinner.
